original_title: Lost in the Amazon: The Enigma of Col. Percy Fawcett
overview: Legendary explorer Col. Percy Fawcett takes his son and friend to the Brazilian Amazon to find an ancient civilization: The Lost City of Z. In 1925, he disappears forever. Modern explorer Niall McCann travels to Brazil to solve the mystery.
title: Lost in the Amazon: The Enigma of Col. Percy Fawcett
